mapper.select: SELECT HANDLE_DATETIME AS handleDatetime, MNG_STND_DATE AS mngStndDate, MNG_STND_CRITIC AS mngStndCritic, ERROR_COUNT AS errorCount, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, MODEL_CODE AS modelCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, HANDLE_EMP_NAME AS handleEmpName, MEMO_CONTENT AS memoContent, CALLEE_REQ_DATE AS calleeReqDate, CALLEE_SEQ_NO AS calleeSeqNo, ERROR_METHOD AS errorMethod FROM ATMS_01001190

SELECT HANDLE_DATETIME AS handleDatetime, MNG_STND_DATE AS mngStndDate, MNG_STND_CRITIC AS mngStndCritic, ERROR_COUNT AS errorCount, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, MODEL_CODE AS modelCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, HANDLE_EMP_NAME AS handleEmpName, MEMO_CONTENT AS memoContent, CALLEE_REQ_DATE AS calleeReqDate, CALLEE_SEQ_NO AS calleeSeqNo, ERROR_METHOD AS errorMethod FROM ATMS_01001190 WHERE HANDLE_DATETIME = #{handleDatetime}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_01001190 WHERE HANDLE_DATETIME = #{handleDatetime}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}

UPDATE ATMS_01001190 SET MNG_STND_DATE = #{mngStndDate}, MNG_STND_CRITIC = #{mngStndCritic}, ERROR_COUNT = #{errorCount}, JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, MODEL_CODE = #{modelCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, HANDLE_EMP_NAME = #{handleEmpName}, MEMO_CONTENT = #{memoContent}, CALLEE_REQ_DATE = #{calleeReqDate}, CALLEE_SEQ_NO = #{calleeSeqNo}, ERROR_METHOD = #{errorMethod} WHERE HANDLE_DATETIME = #{handleDatetime}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}

INSERT INTO ATMS_01001190 ( HANDLE_DATETIME, MNG_STND_DATE, MNG_STND_CRITIC, ERROR_COUNT, JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, TERMINAL_NO, CORNER_CODE, MODEL_CODE, CORNER_NAME, HANDLE_EMP_NAME, MEMO_CONTENT, CALLEE_REQ_DATE, CALLEE_SEQ_NO, ERROR_METHOD ) VALUES ( #{handleDatetime}, #{mngStndDate}, #{mngStndCritic}, #{errorCount}, #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{terminalNo}, #{cornerCode}, #{modelCode}, #{cornerName}, #{handleEmpName}, #{memoContent}, #{calleeReqDate}, #{calleeSeqNo}, #{errorMethod} )
